title: Swain is due for another skin! For fun, who has idea's?
body:
I love {{champion:50}} Swain {{champion:50}} 

I think he was one of my first bunch of champs I played and have never stopped liking him. 

I JUST WISH he had another skin.... but the thing about him is he's so detailed, his cloak and his birds... I think a skin for Swain would be a big/tough job for the designers cuz it has to be COOL. 

Has anyone had any ideas for new skin ideas? 

I've thought of, Peacock Swain, Ghost Swain (love the Gnagplank ghost one!) I dunno maybe a 'magician swain' with sparks from under his cloak, lightening somehow? Might not suit the birds though haha. Prehistoric swain?

replies.body:
Swain is scheduled after Eve for a full VGU. Like Urgot and Sion this will be his "new skin". 

I personally would like to see a void skin.
I agree, Swain is a cool-as champ, they have to do a lot of thinking for his next skin - it should be an extra extra cool and good, as he only has so little amount of skins :(
magician swain his birds are doves and stuff and he wearing tux
Ohhh this could work. and the cane thing works too!

or alternatively surprise party swain, and he uses balloon animal birds with squeeky balloon noises. I mean surprise party fiddlesticks has the balloon birdies, and I feel like swain could do it better.

Honestly id love to see dragon trainer swain were beatrice is a small dragon and his ult transform is him turning into a dragon and breathing fireballs at his enemies replacing the ravens... never gonna happen tho
Pirate skin where his hot turns him into a giant parrot

Swains world.  Party time. Excellent. 
Swain warne. Projectile is ball, bird is seagull.
Uncle swain bird is bald eagle

The no-skin skin.  Skeleton Swain!  No birds, but spooky bats.

Or

Hotdog salesman Swain, who carry's a tray of hotdogs in front of him.  When he ults he says "half time break" and throws hotdogs in all directions and little dollar signs appear over his head.

zeus skin 
q is a thunder cloud 
stun is like a cartoon tazer 
ult shoots lightning
